tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "53A158784A5979397AF36EBFD71E736F", "While within a node\'s ZoI, any experience points you gain will count towards the growth of the node. Nodes will level up after they gain enough XP. Higher level nodes offer greater benefits.")
